subject: re:You need these pills
body:
Dear customer.
Wanna save on the medications you buy on the Internet but afraid that it might be dangerous for your health? It won't be with our discount Canadian pharmacy.
Our advice for everyone shopping for medications on the Web is to cling to reliable licensed pharmacies that have been operating on the Internet market for quite a long time already (such as CanadianPharmacy). Want to save on drugs? Try CanadianPharmacy - #1 discount Canadian pharmacy.
Don't look for prices lower than those at CanadianPharmacy anything that is cheaper is a fake.
Yours,Frankie Barton
